nodes.excerpt: Features of Gatsby Starter Haon Gatsby Starter Haon offers the following features: Main Menu ğŸ“Œ  : Provides a reactive web MenuBar in both Header and Aside  : Offers both dark mode and light mode  : Search functionality  : View all tags assigned to posts  : Series feature allows posts to be categorized for easy viewing : Author introduction page. You can create an introduction page by entering "/default/about" and writing in index.md  : Social page for quick communication with the author Side Feâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Features of Gatsby Starter Haon ğŸš€

nodes.excerpt: 1. Markdown Based This template is based on Markdown. To write a post, create a directory under  and write the post in Markdown format. For example, create a directory called  under  and write the post in an  file. In this case, the URL of the post will be . 2. Meta Information Once you create the Markdown file, you must enter the meta information for the post. The required information is as follows. The explanations for each meta information are as follows:  : Title of the post  : Summary of tâ€¦

nodes.excerpt: 0. Create a GitHub Repository & Install Node.js, Gatsby-cli ğŸ’¡ node.js and gatsby-cli must be installed on your computer. Before installing the theme, you need a GitHub Repository for the Gatsby Theme. Please create a repository. 1. Install the Theme ğŸ‘‹ Follow the steps below to create your blog with the theme! 2. Run Gatsby Local Server After downloading the theme to your local machine, follow the steps below to run the Gatsby local server. If the command runs without issues, you can check the iâ€¦
